title: $1300 / 121ft² - $1300 Single-Occupancy Room in Daly City
posting_body: Our brand-new house completed construction in 2016 and is nestled within a nice, safe, and quiet neighborhood.
It's gorgeous with great views stretching all the way to the Golden Gate Bridge on a clear day.
This room is on the upper level and shares a bathroom with one other tenant.
All appliances are top of the line and the house is very well kept.
- Personal vanity in shared bathroom with 1 other roommate
- 5 min from closest shopping center (Serramonte Shopping Mall)
- GE refrigerator, oven, range gas stove, microwave, & dishwasher
- Respectful of roommates, neighbors, and home
- Leaves things better than you found them
- Enjoys the occasional roommate Margarita Friday and dinner
If interested, please reply with a brief introduction about yourself and your current living situation.
